alert.note: Alert for Northern Litchfield; Southern Litchfield (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 04 at 3:22AM EST until March 04 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches and ice accretion of a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph across the higher elevations. * WHERE...In New York, Columbia, eastern Greene, eastern Dutchess and western Ulster Counties. In northwest Connecticut, Litchfield County. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions due to snow and ice covered roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Precipitation will be tapering off by this afternoon.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
